div.div: harm caused by cold with free flux illness

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with free flux illness

sense.def: Pathological Condition of free-flux illness occurring in the course of a disease of the harm-causedby-cold type. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 13: 治傷寒痢，下膿血，宜服竹茹飲子方 , “To cure harm caused by cold with free - flux illness , with outflow of pus and blood, the recipe to ingest a drink with zhu ru is appropriate”.
